article.headline: Alabama A&M 92, Grambling 84
article.story: GRAMBLING, La. (AP) -- Obie Trotter scored 19 points to lead Alabama A&M to a 92-84 win over Grambling State in Southwestern Athletic Conference action Wednesday. The Bulldogs (4-5, 1-1 SWAC) used a balanced attack, getting five players in double figures. Michael Ford scored 17 to join Trotter, while Joe Martin had 16, Evan Hilton had 14 and Marcus Jones added 12. Grambling's Brion Rush led all scorers with 33 points and five assists, but his effort was not enough to get the Tigers (2-6, 1-1) to a win. The Tigers' Anthony Williams had 15, Andre Ratliff scored 13 and John Dorsey scored 11. Alabama A&M led at the half, 43-35.
